text: This List of Australian Group races is recognized as a list of Australia's classified Black type thoroughbred horse races. The Pattern Committee of the Australian Racing Board (ARB) recommends which races shall be designated as Group and Listed races for the racing season. The current list is for the 2019-2020 Australian Racing season and the 2019-2020 which began on Monday, 1 August 2019. ==Group 1,2 and 3 races== Click on the sort symbol at the top of the columns to
